entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and overnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
